sentences.english: Riflemen at the embankment also had cut holes through which they could aim and fire.
sentences.chinese: 堤岸上來復槍手開好了瞄準射擊的射孔。

sentences.english: Look, Kunming lake surrounded by long embankment.
sentences.chinese: 看，昆明湖旁圍着長長地堤岸。

sentences.english: Levees protecting the delta at the mouth of the river are in bad shape, too.
sentences.chinese: 在河流入口處保護三角洲的堤岸也處於危險之中。

sentences.english: Ariadne will shut its door and be hidden within its enclosing cloud banks.
sentences.chinese: 阿里阿德涅會關緊它的門，躲進被雲層圍繞的堤岸。

sentences.english: Step on the embankment, the mood of the moment as the river this evening generally quiet.
sentences.chinese: 步上堤岸，心情瞬間就如這黃昏的江面一般寧靜。

sentences.english: How pleasant thy banks and green valleys below.
sentences.chinese: 你的堤岸與青翠的河谷是多麼令人心醉。

sentences.english: We walked along the Thames embankment.
sentences.chinese: 我們沿着泰晤士河的堤岸散步。

sentences.english: It thundered at the town, and thundered at the cliffs, and brought the coast down, madly .
sentences.chinese: 它大聲恐嚇城市，轟擊懸崖，而且瘋狂地打壞堤岸。

sentences.english: If the ocean made dikes, it is thus that it would build.
sentences.chinese: 如果海洋要建堤岸，它就會這般修建。

sentences.english: When it bursts its banks, we will have a mountain tsunami.
sentences.chinese: 當它衝破堤岸時，我們就會遇到高山海嘯。

sentences.english: With the different type, the natural bunding create a natural wetland system itself.
sentences.chinese: 鶯堤則以各種堤岸型式，自成生態溼地系統。

sentences.english: The river brimmed over its banks.
The soldiers were dispersed along a bank.
She bid me take life easy, as the grass grows on the weirs;
sentences.chinese: 她囑咐我要活得輕鬆，當青草在堤岸滋長。

sentences.english: Rivers break their banks under seasonal downpours and carve new paths.
sentences.chinese: 河流在暴雨季節衝破堤岸，形成新的河道。

definition: a low stone wall built along the water's edge to protect an embankment/revetment
